name: Pass The Salt, Derek.
description:
Download PTSD.zip for original, PTSDv2.zip for no motion blur.

HOW TO PLAY \/ \/ \/

1. Find the salt

2. Place the salt on the plate

WASD and MOUSE to move and look

SPACE to jump

LEFT MOUSE to pickup objects

RIGHT MOUSE while holding to throw

E to open chest

R to rewind

ESCAPE to quit
